If you're looking for something more intense, "Retribution" might be up your alley. It's a gripping drama about a prosecutor seeking justice for a young girl who suffered years of abuse, featuring Salma Hayek and Amber Stevens West. Enjoy the ride!

In this film, Denzel Washington delivers a compelling performance as a real-life Harlem drug lord, while Russell Crowe plays the relentless cop on his tail. The plot is captivating and based on true events.

If you're looking for another crime thriller, "Set It Off" might also appeal to you. This film features an all-star cast including Jada Pinkett Smith and Vivica A. Fox, telling the story of four inner-city women who turn to bank robbery in desperation.

I'd highly recommend "The Monuments Men" if you enjoy a blend of drama and history! It's a captivating story about an eclectic group of art enthusiasts who risk their lives during WWII to save priceless masterpieces from the hands of Nazi thieves. The star-studded cast, including George Clooney and Matt Damon, adds to its charm.

Another great option is "Fury," a powerful war drama that follows a tank crew fighting their way across Germany in April 1945. Brad Pitt delivers a gripping performance in this intense film about survival and camaraderie amidst the horrors of war.

If you're looking for a war movie with a twist, I'd recommend "Paradise Lost". It's about reality show contestants stranded on an island, but things take a dark turn when one of them turns out to be a killer.

Alternatively, if you prefer a historical epic, "Braveheart" is a powerful tale of courage and determination set during the Scottish Wars of Independence. Gerard McSorley, David O'Hara, Angus Macfadyen, Catherine McCormack, and Mel Gibson star in this memorable film.

If you appreciate intriguing plots and intense action, I'd highly recommend "Zero Dark Thirty". This film chronicles the decade-long hunt for Osama bin Laden, culminating in his death in 2011. The star-studded cast includes Jessica Chastain and Joel Edgerton.

If you prefer a different setting, "Winter in Wartime" might be of interest to you. This film takes place in German-occupied Netherlands during World War II, telling the story of a teenage boy who gets involved in the Dutch resistance after helping a wounded RAF pilot. Enjoy your movie time!
